GR14vdhasrtu:128: attā mayā yeṣu na jantavaś ca__Vdha_094.092
GR14vdhasrtu:369: anyā bhāskarasaprabhābhir akhilair bhābhir diśo bhāsayan__Vdha_028.*(18).122
GR14vdhasrtu:486: abhyarcyate vada hare sa kathaṃ mayādya__Vdha_094.111
GR14vdhasrtu:775: ahaś ca rātriś ca ubhe ca saṃdhye__Vdha_055.014
GR14vdhasrtu:826: ākṣipyate kathaya kiṃ nu karomi pāpaḥ__Vdha_094.112
GR14vdhasrtu:1137: itthaṃ kṛpāṃ kuru mayi praṇate kileśa__Vdha_094.109
GR14vdhasrtu:2386: kā sā rakṣā na tāṃ vedmi__Vdha_070.009
GR14vdhasrtu:2484: kiṃ loke tad iha paratra cāsti puṃsām__Vdha_039.047
GR14vdhasrtu:2604: kurvan vā karma na tv aham__Vdha_079.104
GR14vdhasrtu:2957: kliṣṭaṃ mano 'sya viṣayair na mayi prasaṅgi__Vdha_094.109
GR14vdhasrtu:3086: gacchet sa tiryag viphalāṃś ca lokān__Vdha_059.023
GR14vdhasrtu:3360: grastvā sa śete sakalaṃ jagad yas__Vdha_076.028
GR14vdhasrtu:3609: cittaṃ ca na tvayi samāhitam īśa doṣair__Vdha_094.112
GR14vdhasrtu:3696: jagac ca pāty atti ca yaḥ sa sarvadā__Vdha_039.005
GR14vdhasrtu:3697: jagac ca yo yo jagataś ca hetuḥ__Vdha_039.005
GR14vdhasrtu:4285: tat tvaṃ prasīda bhagavan kuru mayy anāthe__Vdha_094.113
GR14vdhasrtu:5095: tasmāt tvam apy etad amoghavid yo__Vdha_008.026
GR14vdhasrtu:5144: tasmān na vācyam anṛtaṃ hi sadbhir__Vdha_055.015
GR14vdhasrtu:5473: tāṃs tān avāpnoty amalāṃś ca lokān__Vdha_046.011
GR14vdhasrtu:5765: teṣv eva tuṣṭeṣv aham eva tuṣṭo__Vdha_050.018
GR14vdhasrtu:5769: te siddhāḥ sma na vai sādhyā__Vdha_102.068
GR14vdhasrtu:5775: tair eva jānīma na yat paraṃ tvāṃ__Vdha_035.036
GR14vdhasrtu:5782: tais tair guṇaiḥ kāmdughā hi bhūtvā__Vdha_059.005
GR14vdhasrtu:5786: taiḥ saṃsmṛtais tat kṣaṇam eva deva__Vdha_094.094
GR14vdhasrtu:5813: tau ca svaṃ svaṃ vapuḥ prāpya__Vdha_067.063
GR14vdhasrtu:5841: trātaṃ jagad yena sa sarvadā prabhur__Vdha_039.021
GR14vdhasrtu:5931: tvatto na śītaṃ na ca keśavoṣṇaṃ__Vdha_103.032
GR14vdhasrtu:6005: tvayy arpitaṃ nātha punaḥ punar me__Vdha_094.090
GR14vdhasrtu:6026: tvaṃ sarvam etat tvayi sarvam etat__Vdha_035.049
GR14vdhasrtu:6045: tvāṃ stotum ambujabhavo 'pi hi deva neśaḥ__Vdha_094.109
GR14vdhasrtu:6358: divaṃ viyad bhūḥ kakubhaś ca viṣṇur__Vdha_065.016
GR14vdhasrtu:6725: dorbhiś cakradharau gadābjamukulau trāsāṃś ca pāśāṅkuśau__Vdha_028.*(18).124
GR14vdhasrtu:6736: dyaur bhūmir āpo hṛdayaṃ yamaś ca__Vdha_055.014
GR14vdhasrtu:6956: dhig dhig ity āha sa baliṃ__Vdha_076.035
GR14vdhasrtu:7152: na te glānir na te khedo__Vdha_075.044
GR14vdhasrtu:7175: na tvām alaṃ stutipatheṣv aham īśitāraṃ__Vdha_094.107
GR14vdhasrtu:7177: na tv evāhaṃ tasya phalād ihāgām__Vdha_079.050
GR14vdhasrtu:7343: na me dṛg eṣā tava rūpam etad__Vdha_035.024
GR14vdhasrtu:7346: na me 'sti bandhur na ca me 'sti śatrur__Vdha_065.021
GR14vdhasrtu:7406: na yat kṛtaṃ tat kvacid asti kiṃcit__Vdha_094.087
GR14vdhasrtu:7409: na yasya rudro na ca padmayonir__Vdha_076.021
GR14vdhasrtu:7410: na yasya rūpaṃ na balaṃ prabhāvo__Vdha_076.025
GR14vdhasrtu:7609: na santi te deva bhuvi pradeśā__Vdha_094.092
GR14vdhasrtu:7618: na stotum acyuta bhavantam ahaṃ samartho__Vdha_094.112
GR14vdhasrtu:7627: na hanyate hanti ca so 'raṇe ripūn__Vdha_061.018
GR14vdhasrtu:8059: nihatya vāliṃ ca kapīśvaraṃ hi yo__Vdha_039.039
GR14vdhasrtu:8152: naivārcanair alam ahaṃ tava deva yogyaḥ__Vdha_094.112
GR14vdhasrtu:8215: paṭheta yo vai śṛṇuyāc ca bhaktyā__Vdha_056.038
GR14vdhasrtu:8265: padaṃ dhruvaṃ tat paramaṃ tvam eva__Vdha_035.029
GR14vdhasrtu:8412: paraḥ samastasya ca yaḥ sa devo__Vdha_039.009
GR14vdhasrtu:8770: puṇyaṃ pavitram atha pāpaharaṃ śubhaṃ ca__Vdha_Maṅg2
GR14vdhasrtu:9328: prapāś ca kūpāś ca pratiśrayāś ca__Vdha_046.007
GR14vdhasrtu:10514: bhūtvā kṛpālur amalām aja dehi buddhim__Vdha_094.105
GR14vdhasrtu:10845: manye ca viṣṇuṃ na paraṃ tato 'nyat__Vdha_065.018
GR14vdhasrtu:11086: mā me dharmo hy adharmo vā__Vdha_068.037
GR14vdhasrtu:11286: maitrī na yeṣāṃ vinayāya tāṃs tān__Vdha_035.045
GR14vdhasrtu:11356: yac ca yac ca nṛpeṣṭaṃ te__Vdha_002.076
GR14vdhasrtu:11520: yat tvāṃ pṛcchāmi tan me tvaṃ__Vdha_083.009
GR14vdhasrtu:11651: yathā paraṃ brahma haris tathā paraṃ__Vdha_069.029
GR14vdhasrtu:11791: yad asti yan nāsti ca tat tvam eva__Vdha_094.085
GR14vdhasrtu:11892: yad dṛśyaṃ yac ca vai spṛśyaṃ__Vdha_066.087
GR14vdhasrtu:11920: yad yad icchāmy ahaṃ tat tat__Vdha_002.055
GR14vdhasrtu:11993: yan mānasaṃ yac ca karomi vācā__Vdha_092.026
GR14vdhasrtu:12101: yas tvām anu sa mām anu__Vdha_036.002
GR14vdhasrtu:12102: yas tvāṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti__Vdha_036.002
GR14vdhasrtu:12112: yasmād idaṃ bhavati yatra jagat tathedaṃ__Vdha_094.108
GR14vdhasrtu:12131: yasmiṃl layaṃ vrajati yaś ca jagatsvarūpaḥ__Vdha_094.108
GR14vdhasrtu:12316: yān yān kāmān naraḥ strī vā__Vdha_084.028
GR14vdhasrtu:12563: yeṣāṃ na maitrī hṛdi te na neyā__Vdha_035.046
GR14vdhasrtu:12733: yo vai bhavān ko 'pi nato 'smi tasmai__Vdha_035.051
GR14vdhasrtu:13665: viśvasya viśvaṃ svayam eva ca tvam__Vdha_035.027
GR14vdhasrtu:13819: viṣṇuḥ samastaṃ na paraṃ ca devaḥ__Vdha_065.019
GR14vdhasrtu:13989: vedāś ca vedyaṃ ca bhagavān ananto__Vdha_072.063
GR14vdhasrtu:14020: vairaṃ ca tair yasya mamāpi vairam__Vdha_050.018
GR14vdhasrtu:14285: śārīram apy ācaritaṃ ca yan me__Vdha_092.026
GR14vdhasrtu:14630: śrotā ca śabdasya hare tvam ekaḥ__Vdha_103.018
GR14vdhasrtu:14853: sa tvaṃ prahara vā mā vā__Vdha_002.028
GR14vdhasrtu:14941: sa no bandhuḥ sa no gatiḥ__Vdha_060.028
GR14vdhasrtu:15466: sarvaṃ hi viṣṇur na paraṃ tato 'nyat__Vdha_065.018
GR14vdhasrtu:15500: sarvāṃś ca vedān saha ṣaḍbhir aṅgaiḥ__Vdha_061.017
GR14vdhasrtu:15925: sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca vane ca vāsam__Vdha_061.017
GR14vdhasrtu:16030: surāṃś ca yajñasya bhujaḥ sa sarvadā__Vdha_039.036
GR14vdhasrtu:16186: stutaḥ kramād yaḥ pradade sa sarvadā__Vdha_039.034
GR14vdhasrtu:16207: stotuṃ bhavantam alam īśa na kaścid asti__Vdha_094.108
GR14vdhasrtu:16530: svastho bhavaty eṣa vaco yathā hareḥ__Vdha_028.062
